main event: A civilian observer spotted two very bright objects resembling silver mirrors hovering near a high-flying aircraft.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1.5 minutes.,The objects appeared closer than the jet contrails.,The observer was driving at about 35 MPH when the objects were first noticed while going up a hill.,The weather was reported clear with good visibility.,There is uncertainty about whether the observer saw a reflection.
sighted object: two very bright objects resembling silver mirrors
witness description: A housewife from Dinwiddie, VA, who was driving at the time of the sighting.
